property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's elements that costs 3 or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature blocks, after the battle, destroy it. ■ When this creature is destroyed, Abyss Mechraid 5. Abyss {MECHRAID} 5 - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use a Abyss card that costs 5 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your other Giants into your mana zone. If you do, Giant Mechraid 8. Giant {MECHRAID} 8 - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use a Giant card that costs 8 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may summon this creature from your mana zone. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ This creature has all civilizations while in the battle zone or in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one light creature and at least one water creature, you may choose both: ► Shieldify a card from your hand face up: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While battling, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ During your opponent's turn, if your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, your opponent puts that creature into their graveyard instead.
